monogr.author: Aeschylus
monogr.title: Aeschylus, with an English translation by Herbert Weir Smyth, Ph. D. in two volumes. 2.Eumenides

imprint.publisher: Cambridge, Mass., Harvard University Press; London, William Heinemann, Ltd.

respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.

$Log: aesch.eum_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-10-09 19:49:18  rsingh04
more reorganizing of texts module by collection

Revision 1.1  2009/10/07 20:59:53  rsingh04
began reorganizing texts module by collection.  created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files

Revision 1.3  2005/08/01 15:44:56  packel
really removed item tags

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 15:32:41  packel
removed stray item tags

Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:27:02  packel
Converted to XML

Revision 1.9  2004/04/21 20:28:10  mimno
added card 1s

Revision 1.8  2003/07/01 22:14:25  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.7  2000/03/04 20:33:49  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.6  2000/02/17 17:46:03  amahoney
use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks;  put cards at ends of
such speeches after the close tag;  put sp and speaker tags on the divs
of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so
we lost the speaker info)

Revision 1.5  1999/12/22 22:12:18  amahoney
convert to P3

sp.speaker: *puqia/s
l: prw=ton me\n eu)xh=| th=|de presbeu/w qew=n
h(\ dh\ to\ mhtro\s deute/ra to/d' e(/zeto
mantei=on, w(s lo/gos tis: e)n de\ tw=| tri/tw|

l.#text: la/xei, qelou/shs, ou)de\ pro\s bi/an tino/s,

l: e)s th/nde gai=an h)=lqe *parnhsou= q' e(/dras.
pe/mpousi d' au)to\n kai\ sebi/zousin me/ga

l.#text: molo/nta d' au)to\n ka/rta timalfei= lew/s,

l: te/xnhs de/ nin *zeu\s e)/nqeon kti/sas fre/na
i(/zei te/tarton toi=sde ma/ntin e)n qro/nois:

l.#text: kai\ nu=n tuxei=n me tw=n pri\n ei)so/dwn makrw=|

l: manteu/omai ga\r w(s a)\n h(gh=tai qeo/s.
h)= deina\ le/cai, deina\ d' o)fqalmoi=s drakei=n,

l.#text: pa/lin m' e)/pemyen e)k do/mwn tw=n *loci/ou,

l: w(s mh/te swkei=n mh/te m' a)ktai/nein ba/sin,
tre/xw de\ xersi/n, ou) podwkei/a| skelw=n:
dei/sasa ga\r grau=s ou)de/n, a)nti/pais me\n ou)=n.

l.#text: e)gw\ me\n e(/rpw pro\s polustefh= muxo/n:
o(rw= d' e)p' o)mfalw=| me\n a)/ndra qeomush=
a)rgh=ti mallw=|: th=|de ga\r tranw=s e)rw=.
pro/sqen de\ ta)ndro\s tou=de qaumasto\s lo/xos

l: dei=pnon ferou/sas: a)/pteroi/ ge mh\n i)dei=n
au(=tai, me/lainai d' e)s to\ pa=n bdelu/ktropoi:
e)k d' o)mma/twn lei/bousi dusfilh= li/ba:

l.#text: kai\ ko/smos ou)/te pro\s qew=n a)ga/lmata

l: fe/rein di/kaios ou)/t' e)s a)nqrw/pwn ste/gas.
to\ fu=lon ou)k o)/pwpa th=sd' o(mili/as
ou)d' h(/tis ai)=a tou=t' e)peu/xetai ge/nos

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: ou)/toi prodw/sw: dia\ te/lous de/ soi fu/lac

l.#text: e)ggu\s parestw\s kai\ pro/sw d' a)postatw=n

l: e)xqroi=si toi=s soi=s ou) genh/somai pe/pwn.
kai\ nu=n a(lou/sas ta/sde ta\s ma/rgous o(ra=|s:
u(/pnw| pesou=sai d' ai( kata/ptustoi ko/rai,
grai=ai palaiai\ pai=des, ai(=s ou) mei/gnutai

l.#text: qew=n tis ou)d' a)/nqrwpos ou)de\ qh/r pote.

l: kakw=n d' e(/kati ka)ge/nont', e)pei\ kako\n
o(/mws de\ feu=ge mhde\ malqako\s ge/nh|.

l.#text: e)lw=si ga/r se kai\ di' h)pei/rou makra=s

l: bibw=nt' a)n' ai)ei\ th\n planostibh= xqo/na
u(pe/r te po/nton kai\ perirru/tas po/leis.
w(/st' e)s to\ pa=n se tw=nd' a)palla/cai po/nwn:
kai\ ga\r ktanei=n s' e)/peisa mhtrw=|on de/mas.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: e)pei\ d' e)pi/sta|, kai\ to\ mh\ 'melei=n ma/qe.
sqe/nos de\ poiei=n eu)= fere/gguon to\ so/n.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: me/mnhso, mh\ fo/bos se nika/tw fre/nas.
su\ d', au)ta/delfon ai(=ma kai\ koinou= patro/s,

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stras *ei)/dwlon
l: eu(/doit' a)/n, w)h/, kai\ kaqeudousw=n ti/ dei=;

l.#text: e)gw\ d' u(f' u(mw=n w(=d' a)phtimasme/nh

l: a)/lloisin e)n nekroi=sin, w(=n me\n e)/ktanon
ai)sxrw=s d' a)lw=mai: prounne/pw d' u(mi=n o(/ti

l.#text: paqou=sa d' ou(/tw deina\ pro\s tw=n filta/twn,
e)n h(me/ra| de\ moi=r' a)pro/skopos brotw=n.
h)= polla\ me\n dh\ tw=n e)mw=n e)lei/cate,

l: kai\ nukti/semna dei=pn' e)p' e)sxa/ra| puro\s

l.#text: kai\ pa/nta tau=ta la\c o(rw= patou/mena.

l: o( d' e)calu/cas oi)/xetai nebrou= di/khn,
kai\ tau=ta kou/fws e)k me/swn a)rkusta/twn
a)kou/saq' w(s e)/leca th=s e)mh=s peri\

l.#text: yuxh=s, fronh/sat', w)= kata\ xqono\s qeai/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: mugmo/s.

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stras *ei)/dwlon
l: mu/zoit' a)/n, a(nh\r d' oi)/xetai feu/gwn pro/sw:
fi/loi ga/r ei)sin ou)k e)moi=s proseiko/tes.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)gmo/s.

l.#text: ti/ soi pe/prwtai pra=gma plh\n teu/xein kaka/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w)gmo/s.

sp.speaker: *klutaimh/stras *ei)/dwlon
l: o)/nar diw/keis qh=ra, klaggai/neis d' a(/per
ti/ dra=|s; a)ni/stw, mh/ se nika/tw po/nos,
su\ d' ai(mathro\n pneu=m' e)pouri/sasa tw=|,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: e)/geir', e)/geire kai\ su\ th/nd', e)gw\ de\ se/.

l: i)dw/meq' ei)/ ti tou=de froimi/ou mata=|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: h)= polla\ dh\ paqou=sa kai\ ma/thn e)gw/,
e)c a)rku/wn pe/ptwken oi)/xetai/ q' o( qh/r.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: to\n i(ke/tan se/bwn, a)/qeon a)/ndra kai\
to\n mhtraloi/an d' e)ce/kleyas w)\n qeo/s.
ti/ tw=nd' e)rei= tis dikai/ws e)/xein;

l.#text: e)moi\ d' o)/neidos e)c o)neira/twn molo\n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: para\ no/mon qew=n bro/tea me\n ti/wn,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ka)moi/ ge lupro/s, kai\ to\n ou)k e)klu/setai,

l.#text: u(po/ te ga=n fugw\n ou)/ pot' e)leuqerou=tai.

l: potitro/paios w)\n d' e(/teron e)n ka/ra|

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: mh\ kai\ labou=sa pthno\n a)rghsth\n o)/fin,
a)nh=|s u(p' a)/lgous me/lan' a)p' a)nqrw/pwn a)fro/n,
di/kai sfagai/ te spe/rmato/s t' a)pofqora=|
leusmo/s te, kai\ mu/zousin oi)ktismo\n polu\n
ste/rghqr' e)/xousai; pa=s d' u(fhgei=tai tro/pos
poi/mnhs toiau/ths d' ou)/tis eu)filh\s qew=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: au)to\s su\ tou/twn ou) metai/tios pe/lh|,

l.#text: a)ll' ei(=s to\ pa=n e)/pracas w)\n panai/tios.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: pw=s dh/; tosou=to mh=kos e)/kteinon lo/gou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e)/xrhsas w(/ste to\n ce/non mhtroktonei=n.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: e)/xrhsa poina\s tou= patro\s pra=cai. ti/ mh/n ;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ka)/peiq' u(pe/sths ai(/matos de/ktwr ne/ou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ ta\s propompou\s dh=ta ta/sde loidorei=s;

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: ou) ga\r do/moisi toi=sde pro/sforon molei=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)/stin h(mi=n tou=to prostetagme/non.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: ti/s h(/de timh/; ko/mpason ge/ras kalo/n.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: ti/ ga\r gunaiko\s h(/tis a)/ndra nosfi/sh|;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ou)k a)\n ge/noiq' o(/maimos au)qe/nths fo/nos.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: h)= ka/rt' a)/tima kai\ par' ou)de\n ei)rga/sw
eu)nh\ ga\r a)ndri\ kai\ gunaiki\ mo/rsimos
ei) toi=sin ou)=n ktei/nousin a)llh/lous xala=|s

l.#text: to\ mh\ ti/nesqai mhd' e)popteu/ein ko/tw|,

l: ta\ me\n ga\r oi)=da ka/rta s' e)nqumoume/nhn,

l.#text: to\n a)/ndr' e)kei=non ou)/ ti mh\ li/pw pote/.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: su\ d' ou)=n di/wke kai\ po/non plei/w ti/qou.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tima\s su\ mh\ su/ntemne ta\s e)ma\s lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
sp.l: ou)d' a)\n dexoi/mhn w(/st' e)/xein tima\s se/qen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: me/gas ga\r e)/mpas pa\r *dio\s qro/nois le/gh|.

l.#text: e)gw\ d', a)/gei ga\r ai(=ma mhtrw=|on, di/kas

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: e)gw\ d' a)rh/cw to\n i(ke/thn te r(u/somai:
deinh\ ga\r e)n brotoi=si ka)n qeoi=s pe/lei
tou= prostropai/ou mh=nis, ei) prodw= sf' e(kw/n.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: a)ll' a)mblu\s h)/dh prostetrimme/nos te pro\s
pro/seimi dw=ma kai\ bre/tas to\ so/n, qea/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ei)=en: to/d' e)sti\ ta)ndro\s e)kfane\s te/kmar.
spla/gxnon: xqono\s ga\r pa=s pepoi/mantai to/pos,
kai\ nu=n o(/d' e)nqa/d' e)sti/ pou kataptakw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: o( d' au)=te/ g' ou)=n a)lka\n e)/xwn
to\ d' ou) pa/restin: ai(=ma mhtrw=|on xamai\
a)ll' a)ntidou=nai dei= s' a)po\ zw=ntos r(ofei=n

l.#text: e)ruqro\n e)k mele/wn pe/lanon: a)po\ de\ sou=

l: kai\ zw=nta/ s' i)sxna/nas' a)pa/comai ka/tw,
o)/yei de\ kei)/ tis a)/llos h)/liten brotw=n

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: pollou\s kaqarmou/s, kai\ le/gein o(/pou di/kh
siga=n q' o(moi/ws: e)n de\ tw=|de pra/gmati

l.#text: bri/zei ga\r ai(=ma kai\ marai/netai xero/s,

l: potai/nion ga\r o)\n pro\s e(sti/a| qeou=
polu\s de/ moi ge/noit' a)\n e)c a)rxh=s lo/gos,

l.#text: kai\ nu=n a)f' a(gnou= sto/matos eu)fh/mws kalw=

l: molei=n a)rwgo/n: kth/setai d' a)/neu doro\s

l.#text: au)to/n te kai\ gh=n kai\ to\n *)argei=on lew\n

l: pisto\n dikai/ws e)s to\ pa=n te su/mmaxon.
e)/lqoiklu/ei de\ kai\ pro/swqen w)\n qeo/s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: r(u/sait' a)\n w(/ste mh\ ou) parhmelhme/non

l: e)/rrein, to\ xai/rein mh\ maqo/nq' o(/pou frenw=n,

l.#text: kai\ zw=n me dai/seis ou)de\ pro\s bwmw=| sfagei/s:

l: u(/mnon d' a)kou/sh| to/nde de/smion se/qen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: a)/ge dh\ kai\ xoro\n a(/ywmen, e)pei\

l.#text: le/cai te la/xh ta\ kat' a)nqrw/pous

l: o(/stis d' a)litw\n w(/sper o(/d' a(nh\r

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: ma=ter a(/ m' e)/tiktes, w)= ma=ter

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: gignome/naisi la/xh ta/d' e)f' a(mi\n e)kra/nqh:

l.#text: a)qana/twn d' a)pe/xein xe/ras, ou)de/ tis e)sti/

l: palleu/kwn de\ pe/plwn a)po/moiros a)/klhros e)tu/xqhn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: speu/domen ai(/d' a)felei=n tina\ ta/sde meri/mnas,

l: qew=n d' a)te/leian e)mai=s mele/tais e)pikrai/nein,

l.#text: *zeu\s d' ai(mostage\s a)cio/mison e)/qnos to/de le/sxas
do/cai t' a)ndrw=n kai\ ma/l' u(p' ai)qe/ri semnai\

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pi/ptwn d' ou)k oi)=den to/d' u(p' a)/froni lu/ma|:
toi=on ga\r e)pi\ kne/fas a)ndri\ mu/sos pepo/tatai,
kai\ dnofera/n tin' a)xlu\n kata\ dw/matos au)da=-

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: h(\n dh=t' *)axaiw=n a)/ktore/s te kai\ pro/moi,
e)/neiman au)to/premnon ei)s to\ pa=n e)moi/,
kainh\n d' o(rw=sa th/nd' o(mili/an xqono\s
tarbw= me\n ou)de/n, qau=ma d' o)/mmasin pa/ra.
ti/nes pot' e)ste/; pa=si d' e)s koino\n le/gw:
bre/tas te tou)mo\n tw=|d' e)fhme/nw| ce/nw|,

l.#text: u(ma=s q' o(moi/as ou)deni\ spartw=n ge/nei,

l: ou)/t' e)n qeai=si pro\s qew=n o(rwme/nas
le/gein d' a)/momfon o)/nta tou\s pe/las kakw=s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: *)arai\ d' e)n oi)/kois gh=s u(pai\ keklh/meqa.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: ge/nos me\n oi)=da klhdo/nas t' e)pwnu/mous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tima/s ge me\n dh\ ta\s e)ma\s peu/sh| ta/xa.

l.#text: ma/qoim' a)/n, ei) le/goi tis e)mfanh= lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: brotoktonou=ntas e)k do/mwn e)lau/nomen.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: kai\ tw=| ktano/nti pou= to\ te/rma th=s fugh=s;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: o(/pou to\ xai/rein mhdamou= nomi/zetai.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: h)= kai\ toiau/tas tw=|d' e)pirroizei=s fuga/s;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: a)/llais a)na/gkais, h)/ tinos tre/wn ko/ton;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pou= ga\r tosou=to ke/ntron w(s mhtroktonei=n;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: duoi=n paro/ntoin h(/misus lo/gou pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' o(/rkon ou) de/cait' a)/n, ou) dou=nai qe/loi.

l.#text: klu/ein di/kaios ma=llon h)\ pra=cai qe/leis.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s dh/; di/dacon: tw=n sofw=n ga\r ou) pe/nh|.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: o(/rkois ta\ mh\ di/kaia mh\ nika=n le/gw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' e)ce/legxe, kri=ne d' eu)qei=an di/khn.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: h)= ka)p' e)moi\ tre/poit' a)\n ai)ti/as te/los;

l.#text: pw=s d' ou)/; se/bousai/ g' a)ci/an ka)p' a)ci/wn.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: ti/ pro\s ta/d' ei)pei=n, w)= ce/n', e)n me/rei qe/leis;
le/cas de\ xw/ran kai\ ge/nos kai\ cumfora\s
ta\s sa/s, e)/peita to/nd' a)munaqou= yo/gon:
ei)/per pepoiqw\s th=| di/kh| bre/tas to/de
tou/tois a)mei/bou pa=sin eu)maqe/s ti/ moi.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: tw=n sw=n e)pw=n me/lhm' a)fairh/sw me/ga.

l.#text: ou)k ei)mi\ prostro/paios, ou)d' e)/xwn mu/sos

l: pro\s xeiri\ th)mh=| to\ so\n e)fezo/mhn bre/tas.
tekmh/rion de\ tw=nde/ soi le/cw me/ga.
e)/st' a)\n pro\s a)ndro\s ai(/matos kaqarsi/ou
oi)/koisi, kai\ botoi=si kai\ r(utoi=s po/rois.

l.#text: tau/thn me\n ou(/tw fronti/d' e)kpodw\n le/gw.

l: ge/nos de\ tou)mo\n w(s e)/xei peu/sh| ta/xa.
e)/qhkas. e)/fqiq' ou(=tos ou) kalw=s, molw\n
ei)s oi)=kon: a)lla/ nin kelaino/frwn e)mh\
ka)gw\ katelqw/n, to\n pro\ tou= feu/gwn xro/non,
ei) mh/ ti tw=nd' e)/rcaimi tou\s e)paiti/ous.
su\ d' ei) dikai/ws ei)/te mh\ kri=non di/khn:
pra/cas ga\r e)n soi\ pantaxh=| ta/d' ai)ne/sw.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=

l.#text: to\ pra=gma mei=zon, ei)/ tis oi)/etai to/de

l: broto\s dika/zein: ou)de\ mh\n e)moi\ qe/mis
a)/llws te kai\ su\ me\n kathrtukw\s e)moi=s

l.#text: ou(/tws d' a)/momfon o)/nta s' ai)dou=mai po/lei.

l: au(=tai d' e)/xousi moi=ran ou)k eu)pe/mpelon,

l.#text: toiau=ta me\n ta/d' e)sti/n: a)mfo/tera, me/nein

l: e)pei\ de\ pra=gma deu=r' e)pe/skhyen to/de,
qesmo\n to\n ei)s a(/pant' e)gw\ qh/sw xro/non.

l.#text: u(mei=s de\ martu/ria/ te kai\ tekmh/ria

l: kri/nasa d' a)stw=n tw=n e)mw=n ta\ be/ltata

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)s to\ pa=n de/ soi le/gw,

l.#text: e(kw\n d' a)na/gkas a)/ter di/kaios w)\n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: gela=| de\ dai/mwn e)p' a)ndri\ qermw=|,

l: di' ai)w=nos de\ to\n pri\n o)/lbon

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: siga=n a)rh/gei kai\ maqei=n qesmou\s e)mou\s
po/lin te pa=san ei)s to\n ai)anh= xro/non
kai\ tou/sd' o(/pws a)\n eu)= katagnwsqh=| di/kh.

l.#text: ti/ tou=de soi\ me/testi pra/gmatos le/ge.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: i(ke/ths o(/d' a(nh\r kai\ do/mwn e)fe/stios
e)mw=n, fo/nou de\ tou=d' e)gw\ kaqa/rsios
kai\ cundikh/swn au)to/s: ai)ti/an d' e)/xw

l.#text: th=s tou=de mhtro\s tou= fo/nou. su\ d' ei)/sage

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: u(mw=n o( mu=qos, ei)sa/gw de\ th\n di/khn:
o( ga\r diw/kwn pro/teros e)c a)rxh=s le/gwn

sp.speaker: *xoros

l.#text: pollai\ me/n e)smen, le/comen de\ sunto/mws.

l: e)/pos d' a)mei/bou pro\s e)/pos e)n me/rei tiqei/s
th\n mhte/r' ei)pe\ prw=ton ei) kate/ktonas.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: e)/kteina: tou/tou d' ou)/tis a)/rnhsis pe/lei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: e(\n me\n to/d' h)/dh tw=n triw=n palaisma/twn.

l.#text: ou) keime/nw| pw to/nde kompa/zeis lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)pei=n ge me/ntoi dei= s' o(/pws kate/ktanes.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: le/gw: cifoulkw=| xeiri\ pro\s de/rhn temw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pro\s tou= d' e)pei/sqhs kai\ ti/nos bouleu/masin;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: toi=s tou=de qesfa/toisi: marturei= de/ moi.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: kai\ deu=ro/ g' a)ei\ th\n tu/xhn ou) me/mfomai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ei)/ se ma/ryei yh=fos, a)/ll' e)rei=s ta/xa.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: pe/poiq'. a)rwga\s d' e)k ta/fou pe/myei path/r.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: nekroi=si/ nun pe/pisqi mhte/ra ktanw/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pw=s dh/; di/dacon tou\s dika/zontas ta/de.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: a)ndroktonou=sa pate/r' e)mo\n kate/ktanen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: toiga\r su\ me\n zh=|s, h( d' e)leuqe/ra fo/nw|.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: ti/ d' ou)k e)kei/nhn zw=san h)/launes fugh=|;

l.#text: ou)k h)=n o(/maimos fwto\s o(\n kate/ktanen.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: e)gw\ de\ mhtro\s th=s e)mh=s e)n ai(/mati;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pw=s ga/r s' e)/qrey' a)\n e)nto/s, w)= miaifo/ne,

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
l: h)/dh su\ martu/rhson: e)chgou= de/ moi,
dra=sai ga\r w(/sper e)sti\n ou)k a)rnou/meqa.
a)ll' ei) di/kaion ei)/te mh\ th=| sh=| freni\
dokei= to/d' ai(=ma, kri=non, w(s tou/tois fra/sw.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn

l.#text: qesmo\n dikai/ws,ma/ntis w)\n d' ou) yeu/somai.

l: ou)k a)ndro/s, ou) gunaiko/s, ou) po/lews pe/ri,

l.#text: to\ me\n di/kaion tou=q' o(/son sqe/nei maqei=n,
boulh=| pifau/skw d' u)/mm' e)pispe/sqai patro/s:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: *zeu/s, w(s le/geis su/, to/nde xrhsmo\n w)/pase,

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn

l.#text: ou) ga/r ti tau)to\n a)/ndra gennai=on qanei=n

l: kai\ tau=ta pro\s gunaiko/s, ou)/ ti qouri/ois
a)ll' w(s a)kou/sh|, *palla\s oi(/ t' e)fh/menoi

l.#text: a)ndro\s me\n u(mi=n ou(=tos ei)/rhtai mo/ros

l: tau/thn toiau/thn ei)=pon, w(s dhxqh=| lew/s,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: patro\s protima=| *zeu\s mo/ron tw=| sw=| lo/gw|:

l: pw=s tau=ta tou/tois ou)k e)nanti/ws le/geis;
u(ma=s d' a)kou/ein tau=t' e)gw\ martu/romai.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn

l.#text: pe/das me\n a)\n lu/seien, e)/sti tou=d' a)/kos

l: a)ndro\s d' e)peida\n ai(=m' a)naspa/sh| ko/nis

l.#text: ou(mo/s, ta\ d' a)/lla pa/nt' a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pw=s ga\r to\ feu/gein tou=d' u(perdikei=s o(/ra:
to\ mhtro\s ai(=m' o(/maimon e)kxe/as pe/doi

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: kai\ tou=to le/cw, kai\ ma/q' w(s o)rqw=s e)rw=.
ou)/k e)/sti mh/thr h( keklhme/nou te/knou

l.#text: ti/ktei d' o( qrw/|skwn, h( d' a(/per ce/nw| ce/nh

l: e)/swsen e)/rnos, oi(=si mh\ bla/yh| qeo/s.
tekmh/rion de\ tou=de/ soi dei/cw lo/gou.
path\r me\n a)\n ge/noit' a)/neu mhtro/s: pe/las
a)ll' oi(=on e)/rnos ou)/tis a)\n te/koi qeo/s.

l.#text: e)gw\ de/, *palla/s, ta)/lla q' w(s e)pi/stamai,

l: to\ so\n po/lisma kai\ strato\n teu/cw me/gan,
kai\ to/nd' e)/pemya sw=n do/mwn e)fe/stion,

l.#text: o(/pws ge/noito pisto\s ei)s to\ pa=n xro/nou

l: kai\ tou\s e)/peita, kai\ ta/d' ai)anw=s me/noi
ste/rgein ta\ pista\ tw=nde tou\s e)pispo/rous.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: h)/dh keleu/w tou/sd' a)po\ gnw/mhs fe/rein

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: h(mi=n me\n h)/dh pa=n teto/ceutai be/los.
me/nw d' a)kou=sai pw=s a)gw\n kriqh/setai.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: ti/ ga/r; pro\s u(mw=n pw=s tiqei=s', a)/momfos w)=;

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: h)kou/saq' w(=n h)kou/sat', e)n de\ kardi/a|

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: e)/stai de\ kai\ to\ loipo\n *ai)ge/ws stratw=|
skhna/s q', o(/t' h)=lqon *qhse/ws kata\ fqo/non

l.#text: pe/tra, pa/gos t' *)/areios: e)n de\ tw=| se/bas

l: a)stw=n fo/bos te cuggenh\s to\ mh\ a)dikei=n
sxh/sei to/ t' h)=mar kai\ kat' eu)fro/nhn o(mw=s,
kai\ mh\ to\ deino\n pa=n po/lews e)/cw balei=n.
ti/s ga\r dedoikw\s mhde\n e)/ndikos brotw=n;
e)/ruma/ te xw/ras kai\ po/lews swth/rion
e)/xoit' a)/n, oi(=on ou)/tis a)nqrw/pwn e)/xei,
a)stoi=sin ei)s to\ loipo/n: o)rqou=sqai de\ xrh\
kai\ yh=fon ai)/rein kai\ diagnw=nai di/khn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: kai\ mh\n barei=an th/nd' o(mili/an xqono\s

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: ka)/gwge xrhsmou\s tou\s e)mou/s te kai\ *dio\s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

l.#text: a)ll' ai(mathra\ pra/gmat' ou) laxw\n se/beis,

l: mantei=a d' ou)ke/q' a(gna\ manteu/sh| ne/mwn.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: h)= kai\ path/r ti sfa/lletai bouleuma/twn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: le/geis: e)gw\ de\ mh\ tuxou=sa th=s di/khs

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: a)ll' e)/n te toi=s ne/oisi kai\ palaite/rois
qeoi=s a)/timos ei)= su/: nikh/sw d' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: a)/llws te pa/ntws xw)/te deo/menos tu/xoi;

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn
l: su/ toi ta/x' ou)k e)/xousa th=s di/khs te/los

l.#text:
e)mh=| to
 i)o
 ou)de
 e)xqroi=sin baru/n.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: e)mo\n to/d' e)/rgon, loisqi/an kri=nai di/khn.
mh/thr ga\r ou)/tis e)sti\n h(/ m' e)gei/nato,
to\ d' a)/rsen ai)nw= pa/nta, plh\n ga/mou tuxei=n,
a(/panti qumw=|, ka/rta d' ei)mi\ tou= patro/s.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: w)= *foi=b' *)/apollon, pw=s a)gw\n kriqh/setai;

l.#text: w)= *nu\c me/laina mh=ter, a)=r' o(ra=|s ta/de;

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths
sp.l: nu=n a)gxo/nhs moi te/rmat', h)\ fa/os ble/pein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(mi=n ga\r e)/rrein, h)\ pro/sw tima\s ne/mein.

sp.speaker: *)apo/llwn

l.#text: gnw/mhs d' a)pou/shs ph=ma gi/gnetai me/ga,

l: balou=sa/ t' oi)=kon yh=fos w)/rqwsen mi/a.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: i)/son ga/r e)sti ta)ri/qmhma tw=n pa/lwn.

sp.speaker: *)ore/sths

l.#text: w)= *palla/s, w)= sw/sasa tou\s e)mou\s do/mous.

l: e(/kati, kai\ tou= pa/nta krai/nontos tri/tou
sw/|zei me, mhtro\s ta/sde sundi/kous o(rw=n.

l.#text: e)gw\ de\ xw/ra| th=|de kai\ tw=| sw=| stratw=|

l: to\ loipo\n ei)s a(/panta pleisth/rh xro/non

l.#text: mh/toi tin' a)/ndra deu=ro prumnh/thn xqono\s

l: au)toi\ ga\r h(mei=s o)/ntes e)n ta/fois to/te

l.#text: kai\ xai=re, kai\ su\ kai\ polissou=xos lew/s:
e)gw\ d' a)/timos a( ta/laina baru/kotos

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=

l.#text: ou) ga\r neni/khsq', a)ll' i)so/yhfos di/kh

l: a)ll' e)k *dio\s ga\r lampra\ martu/ria parh=n,
au)to/s q' o( xrh/sas au)to\s h)=n o( marturw=n,
w(s tau=t' *)ore/sthn drw=nta mh\ bla/bas e)/xein.

l.#text: u(mei=s de\ mh\ qumou=sqe mhde\ th=|de gh=|
e(/dras te kai\ keuqmw=nas e)ndi/kou xqono\s
e)gw\ d' a)/timos a( ta/laina baru/kotos

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: ou)k e)/st' a)/timoi, mhd' u(perqu/mws a)/gan
ka)gw\ pe/poiqa *zhni/, kai\ ti/ dei= le/gein;
kai\ klh=|das oi)=da dw/matos mo/nh qew=n,
a)ll' ou)de\n au)tou= dei=: su\ d' eu)piqh\s e)moi\
karpo\n fe/ronta pa/nta mh\ pra/ssein kalw=s
pollh=s de\ xw/ras th=sd' e)/t' a)kroqi/nia

l.#text: qu/h pro\ pai/dwn kai\ gamhli/ou te/lous

l: e)/xous' e)s ai)ei\ to/nd' e)paine/seis lo/gon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)me\ palaio/frona kata/ te ga=s oi)kei=n,

l.#text: pne/w toi me/nos a(/panta/ te ko/ton.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: o)rga\s cunoi/sw soi: geraite/ra ga\r ei)=.
kai\ tw=| me\n <ei)=> su\ ka/rt' e)mou= sofwte/ra:

l.#text: fronei=n de\ ka)moi\ *zeu\s e)/dwken ou) kakw=s.

l: u(mei=s d' e)s a)llo/fulon e)lqou=sai xqo/na
e)/stai poli/tais toi=sde. kai\ su\ timi/an
teu/ch| par' a)ndrw=n kai\ gunaikei/wn sto/lwn,
o(/swn par' a)/llwn ou)/pot' a)\n sxe/qois brotw=n.
su\ d' e)n to/poisi toi=s e)moi=si mh\ ba/lh|s
e)mfu/lio/n te kai\ pro\s a)llh/lous qrasu/n.
qurai=os e)/stw po/lemos, ou) mo/lis parw/n,

l.#text: e)n w(=| tis e)/stai deino\s eu)klei/as e)/rws:

l: e)noiki/ou d' o)/rniqos ou) le/gw ma/xhn

l.#text: toiau=q' e(le/sqai soi pa/restin e)c e)mou=,

l: eu)= drw=san, eu)= pa/sxousan, eu)= timwme/nhn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: e)me\ palaio/frona kata/ te ga=s oi)kei=n,
pne/w toi me/nos a(/panta/ te ko/ton.

l.#text: ti/s m' u(podu/etai, ti/s o)du/na pleura/s;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: w(s mh/pot' ei)/ph|s pro\s newte/ras e)mou=

l.#text: a)ll' ei) me\n a(gno/n e)sti/ soi *peiqou=s se/bas;

l: su\ d' ou)=n me/nois a)/n: ei) de\ mh\ qe/leis me/nein,
ou)/ ta)\n dikai/ws th=|d' e)pirre/pois po/lei
mh=ni/n tin' h)\ ko/ton tin' h)\ bla/bhn stratw=|.

l.#text: e)/cesti ga/r soi th=sde gamo/rw| xqono\s

l: ei)=nai dikai/ws e)s to\ pa=n timwme/nh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)/nass' *)aqa/na, ti/na me fh\s e)/xein e(/dran;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: pa/shs a)ph/mon' oi)zu/os: de/xou de\ su/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ dh\ de/degmai: ti/s de/ moi timh\ me/nei;

l.#text: w(s mh/ tin' oi)=kon eu)qenei=n a)/neu se/qen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: su\ tou=to pra/ceis, w(/ste me sqe/nein to/son;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: tw=| ga\r se/bonti sumfora\s o)rqw/somen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai/ moi pro/pantos e)ggu/hn qh/sh| xro/nou;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: e)/cesti ga/r moi mh\ le/gein a(\ mh\ telw=.

l.#text: qe/lcein m' e)/oikas kai\ meqi/stamai ko/tou.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
sp.l: toiga\r kata\ xqo/n' ou)=s' e)pikth/sh| fi/lous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ ou)=n m' a)/nwgas th=|d' e)fumnh=sai xqoni/;

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: kai\ tau=ta gh=qen e)/k te ponti/as dro/sou
karpo/n te gai/as kai\ botw=n e)pi/rruton
to\ tw=n dikai/wn tw=nd' a)pe/nqhton ge/nos.

l.#text: toiau=ta sou)/sti. tw=n a)reifa/twn d' e)gw\

l: preptw=n a)gw/nwn ou)k a)ne/comai to\ mh\ ou)

l.#text: th/nd' a)stu/nikon e)n brotoi=s tima=n po/lin.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=

l.#text: pa/nta ga\r au(=tai ta\ kat' a)nqrw/pous

l: o( de\ mh\ ku/rsas barew=n tou/twn
ta\ ga\r e)k prote/rwn a)plakh/mata/ nin

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: toi=s q' u(po\ gai=an, peri/ t' a)nqrw/pwn
toi=s me\n a)oida/s, toi=s d' au)= dakru/wn

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: o(/ti moi glw=ssan kai\ sto/m' e)pwpa=|

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
l: pollw=n ga\r to/d' e)n brotoi=s a)/kos.

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: me/ga timw=ntes kai\ gh=n kai\ po/lin

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: xai/rete xu)mei=s: prote/ran d' e)me\ xrh\
i)/te kai\ sfagi/wn tw=nd' u(po\ semnw=n
kata\ gh=s su/menai to\ me\n a)thro\n

sp.speaker: *)aqhna=
l: ai)nw= te mu/qous tw=nde tw=n kateugma/twn
ei)s tou\s e)/nerqe kai\ kata\ xqono\s to/pous

l.#text: tou)mo\n dikai/ws. o)/mma ga\r pa/shs xqono\s

l: tima=te, kai\ to\ fe/ggos o(rma/sqw puro/s,

l.#text: o(/pws a)\n eu)/frwn h(/d' o(mili/a xqono\s

sp.speaker: *propompoi/
l: kai\ timai=s kai\ qusi/ais peri/septa tuxou=sai,

sp.speaker: *propompoi/
l: spondai\ d' e)s to\ pa=n e)k metoi/kwn
